EmailTemplate.name: 18-CSP-VoLTE-Email-Business nurture-T0022I.Email 2 - Case study
EmailTemplate.subject: CSP helps customers to tackle nuisance call
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> CSP helps customers to tackle nuisance calls A leading North American CSP has solved the problem of nuisance calls for its subscribers. Working with Nokia and third-party developer Hiya, the CSP was able to quickly launch its service, allowing users to manage personal information and connections with greater control and confidence. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
